project.name: |-- 001-passing-code-with-named-classes
project.description:
Keywords: + Behavior Parameterization + Predicates + Named classes
This project includes a very simple example involving behavior parameterization using named classes.
PredicatesRunner: Demonstrates how to implement behavior parameterization using named classes. In the example, an ApplePredicate and an AppleFormatter interfaces are defined, and several implementations are given. These implementations are passed to methods defined to filter and pretty print a list of Apple objects.
